posts.post_content:
This card is pretty amaizing, I mean, 3/3 flyer for 4, with the 1+1 boost to your creatures, makes it pretty suitable for Human/Soldier decks, which controll quite an army of weak creatures, which is very nice for this card to boost up.  
  
The 2nd passive effect also is a pretty straightforvard couneter to many kinda of black decks. Phyrexian stuff comes to mind ;)  
  
I love this card and I agree with nunzioni saying :'This is one of Avacyn Restored's best cards and its ridiculous that is is rated under 4.'
posts.html:

The 2nd passive effect also is a pretty straightforvard couneter to many kinda of black decks. Phyrexian stuff comes to mind ;)
